description.value:
Trigger A creature enters the area of the ritual circle

Effect The outline of the circle alights with fire dealing @Damage[4d6[fire]] damage to all creatures within it (@Check[type:reflex|dc:24|basic:true] save). The trap then rolls initiative.

stealth.details: or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Detect Magic] to notice the heavy divine magic in the area

details.description: Three daeodon corpses, animated and enraged by Sezelrian's divine intervention, trample anything within the ritual circle.
details.disable: @Check[type:occultism|dc:21] or @Check[type:religion|dc:21] to disrupt the magic animating the spirits, @Check[type:athletics|dc:25] to hold down one of the daeodons, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Dispel Magic] (3rd-rank, counteract DC 25). 3 successes are required.

publication.title: Pathfinder Society Scenario #5-15: Cleansing the Flame

details.reset: The hazard resets within 24 hours if the cultists of Sezelrian still remain in the area.
details.routine: (three actions) The animated daeodons trample all creatures within the circle, dealing @Damage[(2d8+9)[bludgeoning]] damage (@Check[type:reflex|dc:23|basic:true] save).
